job.title: Early bird tickets for Unreal Fest Chicago are now available
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Early bird tickets for Unreal Fest Chicago are now available. Get yourself that super-early bird pricing at $200 off the full price until February 16.
Join us at the McCormick Place Convention Center's Lakeside Center in June and reserve yours today!: https://t.co/EGSfO6a3rf https://t.co/go1QWlpVP5

job.title: What happens when physical props meet real-time VFX
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
What happens when physical props meet real-time VFX? This deep dive looks at Muzzle Report, custom hardware that connects directly to Unreal Engineâ€”giving actors something real to perform with and creates instant feedback on set.
Watch the full deep dive: https://t.co/iA1d8QqU0Q https://t.co/WKAx5WdDCn

job.title: Dive deep into Agora Studios' A-COM Beta to get a look at everything from character performance and
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Dive deep into Agora Studios' A-COM Beta to get a look at everything from character performance and narrative structure to production design, lighting, VFX, and the Unreal Engine pipeline. All characters and assets featured in the project are available free on FAB!
Go behind the https://t.co/lNjs4669fC

job.title: Plague Doctor by 3D Character Artist Ahmed Sagov is a character crafted using various tools, includi
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Plague Doctor by 3D Character Artist Ahmed Sagov is a character crafted using various tools, including 3DS Max, ZBrush, Substance 3D Painter and rendered in Unreal EngineğŸ¦â€â¬›
This game-ready character is fully rigged for Epic skeletons and is available on Fab: https://t.co/ZQdZiEdfpR

job.title: Headed to IBS 2026
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Headed to IBS 2026? ğŸ
Check out our latest blog to see how our partners and customers are leveraging Unreal Engine to de-risk projects and drive better decision-making in real estate and homebuilding: https://t.co/r6FapdpkHI
You'll have an opportunity to meet some of them at https://t.co/Icbajs1zdp

job.title: Unreal Engine 5's toolset was a strong contributor to helping Valor Mortis' otherworldly 19th-centur
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Unreal Engine 5's toolset was a strong contributor to helping Valor Mortis' otherworldly 19th-century Europe. Nanite, in particular, helped the team create a more dense, detailed world that was also resource efficient.
Take a journey into our interview with @oml_games' Technical https://t.co/HKQ9VIfmPw

job.title: Village in the Clouds by @lucasenvs, is a personal, game-ready environment project based on the artw
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text: Village in the Clouds by @lucasenvs, is a personal, game-ready environment project based on the artwork of ç®€ç¹, created to improve his understanding of large-scale environments in Unreal Engine 5. The scene was crafted from scratch, including props, vegetation, textures, VFX, https://t.co/uIQ0Ws4Huw

job.title: The Winter Olympics started todayğŸ¿
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
The Winter Olympics started todayğŸ¿
Check out our talk from Unreal Fest Stockholm on how SIMICO is pioneering the future of sustainable infrastructure for the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics through SimicoTwin, an innovative urban digital twin platform powered by Unreal https://t.co/UHCKKodzjW

job.title: Procedural Content Generation (PCG) in Unreal Engine has taken a major leap forward in versions 5
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Procedural Content Generation (PCG) in Unreal Engine has taken a major leap forward in versions 5.6 and 5.7, officially reaching Production-Ready status in UE 5.7.
Highlights across both versions include new PCG templates to quickly start graphs with preconfigured setups, https://t.co/4ei5K0I58k

job.title: At @CES 2026, we showcased our UE5 Next-Gen HMI Experience
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text: At @CES 2026, we showcased our UE5 Next-Gen HMI Experience. Developed in collaboration with @AMD, this project demonstrates a single UE5 instance simultaneously rendering the entire digital cockpit experienceâ€”including the instrument cluster, maps, mini map, control panel, and 3D https://t.co/ygl0S1B6VT

job.title: Join Epic Games at GDC 2026
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
Join Epic Games at GDC 2026!
Weâ€™ve got scintillating sessions on Unreal Engine, UEFN, mobile games, procedural content generation, and more.
Grab all the details here ğŸ‘‰https://t.co/YA9I47o9Fk https://t.co/fR2ECV4beI

job.title: We caught up with @oml_games' Technical Director, Krzysztof Dalton Pachulski, to talk about the impa
job.author: @UnrealEngine
job.full_text:
We caught up with @oml_games' Technical Director, Krzysztof Dalton Pachulski, to talk about the impact of Unreal Engine 5â€™s Lumen in the development of â€˜Valor Mortisâ€™: an innovative, original title set in an alternate 19th-century Europe.
Read all about how UE5's toolset helped https://t.co/OOzls7UTHr

job.full_text: RT @80Level: CAD models need hours of cleanup for Unreal Engine. @rapidpipeline's new plugin does it in one click â€“ remove invisible geometâ€¦
